title: publishing: git annex reports lots of failures but publishing seems to "succeed" -- feature or a bug?
body:
```
(git)hopa:~datalad/datalad-debian[master]docs/examples
$> datalad publish-collection ssh://datalad.org/srv/collections.datalad.org/www/demo demo_collection
2015-10-12 23:13:58,866 [ERROR  ] DEBUG: ssh -o "ControlMaster=yes" -o "ControlPath=/var/run/user/47521/datalad/datalad.org" -o "ControlPersist=yes" datalad.org exit (publish_collection.py:153)
bind: Address already in use
channel_setup_fwd_listener_tcpip: cannot listen to port: 3389
Could not request local forwarding.
ControlSocket /var/run/user/47521/datalad/datalad.org already exists, disabling multiplexing
2015-10-12 23:13:59,257 [ERROR  ] stderr| Switched to a new branch 'TEMP'
| Switched to a new branch 'TEMP'
| Switched to a new branch 'TEMP' (cmd.py:319)
2015-10-12 23:14:01,079 [ERROR  ] stderr| Switched to a new branch 'publish2' (cmd.py:319)
2015-10-12 23:14:02,743 [ERROR  ] stderr| To ssh://datalad.org/srv/collections.datalad.org/www/demo/demo_handle2
|  * [new branch]      publish2 -> master (cmd.py:319)
2015-10-12 23:14:06,327 [ERROR  ] stderr| To ssh://datalad.org/srv/collections.datalad.org/www/demo/demo_handle2
|  + 6d07677...3b7ed34 git-annex -> git-annex (forced update) (cmd.py:319)
2015-10-12 23:14:08,105 [ERROR  ] stderr| Switched to branch 'master' (cmd.py:319)
2015-10-12 23:14:08,243 [ERROR  ] stderr| Switched to a new branch 'publish2' (cmd.py:319)
2015-10-12 23:14:08,366 [ERROR  ] stderr| To ssh://datalad.org/srv/collections.datalad.org/www/demo/demo_handle1
|  * [new branch]      publish2 -> master (cmd.py:319)
2015-10-12 23:14:08,419 [ERROR  ] stderr| To ssh://datalad.org/srv/collections.datalad.org/www/demo/demo_handle1
|  + 7eba0e1...7292c30 git-annex -> git-annex (forced update) (cmd.py:319)
2015-10-12 23:14:09,418 [ERROR  ] stderr| bind: Address already in use
| channel_setup_fwd_listener_tcpip: cannot listen to port: 3389
 (cmd.py:319)equest local forwarding.
2015-10-12 23:14:09,423 [ERROR  ] stderr| Switched to branch 'master' (cmd.py:319)
2015-10-12 23:14:09,428 [ERROR  ] stderr| Switched to a new branch 'publish_whkONS' (cmd.py:319)
2015-10-12 23:14:09,665 [ERROR  ] stderr| To ssh://datalad.org/srv/collections.datalad.org/www/demo/DATALAD_COL_demo_collection
|  * [new branch]      publish_whkONS -> master (cmd.py:319)
2015-10-12 23:14:09,678 [ERROR  ] stderr| Switched to branch 'master' (cmd.py:319)
2015-10-12 23:15:38,792 [ERROR  ] stderr| Switched to branch 'master'
| Switched to branch 'master'
| git-annex: get: 14684 failed
| Switched to branch 'master' (cmd.py:319)
 (cmd.py:319):15:38,799 [ERROR  ] stderr| Stop listening request sent.
datalad publish-collection  demo_collection  6.08s user 1.05s system 7% cpu 1:40.29 total
(venv-tests)2 13394.....................................:Mon 12 Oct 2015 11:15:38 PM EDT:.
```

so no error exit code but note annex reporting lots of failures for get (why should it get stuff anyways????)
